heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy with scattered showers, except slight chance near the international border. Highs in the low to mid 50s in the south, mid 50s to around 60 north. East to northeast winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the south.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered showers, mainly along and east of the Greens, and from Lake George southward, diminishing overnight. Lows in the mid to upper 40s, with low to mid 40s northeast and in the Adirondacks. East to northeast 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early.

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly cloudy, except mostly to partly cloudy in the Adirondacks, St. Lawrence, and northern Champlain valleys. Chance of a shower northeast, as well as near and south of Route 4. Highs from the mid 50s to around 60, with some lower 50s northeast, and low to mid 60s in the St. Lawrence Valley. Winds variable to north at 5 to 10 mph.
